setColor(String) - Method in interface shapes.Color
 
setColor(String) - Method in class shapes.Shape
Sets the color of the shape as a valid String name.
setLength(int) - Method in class shapes.Rectangle
Sets the length of the rectangle.
setRadius(int) - Method in class shapes.Circle
Sets the radius of the circle which must be greater than zero (0) or equal to zero if null (default).
setWidth(int) - Method in class shapes.Rectangle
Sets the width of the rectangle.
setX(int) - Method in class shapes.Shape
Sets the x-coordinate where the shape draws.
setY(int) - Method in class shapes.Shape
Sets the y-coordinate where the shape draws.
Shape - Class in shapes
The Shape abstract class definition.
Shape(int, int, String) - Constructor for class shapes.Shape
Constructor sets point where the shape draws.
shapes - package shapes
 
Shapes - Class in shapes
Tests the Circle and Rectangle class which demonstrates polymorphism behavior with late binding and the call to method center() which calls the abstract method draw() from class Shape which in turn calls the concrete method draw() of its subclasses.
Shapes() - Constructor for class shapes.Shapes
